Uses of Class
model.TowerCoordinates

  • Packages that use TowerCoordinates 
    Package Description
    controller  
    model  

    • Uses of TowerCoordinates in controller

      Methods in controller that return TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TowerCoordinates Client.determineMove(int x, int y)
      Determines the next move to play, asks TUI in case of Human Player or the method of Computer Player, handles exceptions before server communication (local check).
      private TowerCoordinates GameThread.getMove(Player current)
      Requests the next move from the currentplayer via the communication of the socket.
      TowerCoordinates StandaloneGame.requestHumanMove(int playerID) 
      Methods in controller with parameters of type TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void GameThread.informClients(TowerCoordinates coord, int id)
      Communicates the next moves to all its clients.

    • Uses of TowerCoordinates in model

      Methods in model that return TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TowerCoordinates ComputerPlayer.determineMove(Board board)
      Determines the coordinates of the tower for the next move.
      TowerCoordinates Strategy.determineMove(Board board, int id)
      Determining the next move by this strategy.
      TowerCoordinates RandomStrategy.determineMove(Board board, int id)
      Determining the next move by choosing a random valid field.
      private TowerCoordinates Board.getTowerCoordinates(int i)
      Returns the TowerCoordinates belonging to a tower index.
      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TowerCoordinates> Board.getAvailableTowers()
      Returns a List of Coordinates of each tower where a piece can be added, i.e. towers with valid coordinates that are not full.
